General.Name: China Yurun Food Group Limited
General.Description: China Yurun Food Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the slaughtering, production, and sale of chilled and frozen meat, and processed meat products in the People's Republic of China. It offers chilled and frozen pork, as well as low and high temperature meat products under the Haroulian brand name. China Yurun Food Group Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Nanjing, the People's Republic of China.
